summary: This is an FBI electronic communication requesting the transfer of evidence items 181-1810 from Miami case 31E-MM-108062 to the New York Evidence Control Unit for review in the active related case 31E-NY-3027571. The case involves Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the synopsis as the subject of the child sex trafficking case for which evidence is being transferred.

events.title: FBI Request for Evidence Transfer
events.description: An FBI agent drafted a request to transfer evidence items from a Miami case to the New York Evidence Control Unit for review in an active related case.

keyFacts: The FBI requested the transfer of evidence items 181 through 1810 from Miami case 31E-MM-108062 to New York for case 31E-NY-3027571.
The active New York case (31E-NY-3027571) is related to the Miami case (31E-MM-108062) and involves Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.
The document is an internal FBI electronic communication dated April 30, 2019, showing coordination between field offices.
The evidence transfer indicates an ongoing investigation into Epstein in New York as of April 2019.
